ygData.subject: You Are Alive.

* Iron Raptor kept her arms around Prowl, not willing to let him go for the 
world.
It was a mericle alone that he was healing like this, after she was purely 
sure that he was going to die.
She rested her back against the wall, her optics always on her love and 
making sure that everything was alright.
In all her life there hadn't been anything as scary as this, and she was 
positive that she never wanted to go through anything like this again.
Iron Raptor wiped a few tears from her optics and sniffed, actually visably 
shaking a bit from the stress of this whole situation.
She had been scared, sad, disappointed, angry and completely shattered, all 
in less then 30 cycles.
It was nerve wracking.
She looked down at the still face of her greatest love, waiting and watching 
for any sign of his awakening.
But nothing came, yet.
Iron Raptor closed her wet optics for a moment and leaned her head back 
until it rested against the wall, a sigh escaping her lips.
It was just the strain of it all.
She opened her optics and satred up at the roof for a few moments, her arms 
still holding Prowl to her.
But then, all of a sudden she heard a voice, her spark nearly jumping clear 
into her throat.
Her head snapped down towards the direction the voice had come from, and her 
optics fell upon the wake form of Prowl.
Iron Raptor pulled Prowl closer to her, moving so that he would be sitting 
upright against her torso but his head would be able to rest on her shoulder 
if he wished.
She watched him, a smile crossing her lips.*

" Yes, you're alive."

* Her fingers caressed along the side of Prowls face while her other hand 
was wrapped around his back and side.
Her fingers wiped what mech'fluid she could get from his face, careful not 
to move him so that anything would hurt.*


>
>"Am... Am I alive?" he says, trying to sit up but wincing with pain as his
>torso acomplishes nothing but a slight jerk.
